message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $100 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and offer the product to you for $125.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'll offer it to you for $130.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.
